questions.name: annualIncome
questions.title: Gross annual income (before tax)
questions.tooltipText: List your total available income including wages, retirement, investments, and rental properties. You are not required to disclose income that is alimony, child support or separate maintenance unless you want to use that income to qualify for a loan. If applicable, include self-employment salary. For total commission earnings, provide an annual average. Increase non-taxable income/benefits by 25%.

questions.name: bankLinking
questions.title: Bank Account Information
questions.plaidDescription: In order to verify your bank account, we partner with Plaid. Plaid is a trusted service that is widely used by most major U.S Banks. It allows you to log into your bank and choose the bank account in which you would like to have your loan proceeds distributed. Click below to proceed
questions.bankDescription: If you are unable to access your bank via Plaid, you may click the 'Proceed without Plaid' button below ( this will require a manual review of your bank account and could delay your funds).
questions.errormessage: Please select PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, TXT, DOC, DOCX format below 2MB
questions.loaderMessage:
Validating Bank Account
Linking Bank Account
Generating Documents for Signature

questions.name: bankName
questions.title: Bank Name, Bank Routing & Bank Account Number

questions.name: thankYou
questions.title: Thank You!
questions.description: We will get back to you once we verify your details.

questions.name: agreePqTerms
questions.title: Bureau data consent for soft pull
questions.consentText: I authorize Marsden Building Society to obtain consumer reports and related information about me from one or more consumer reporting agencies, such as TransUnion, Experian, or Equifax. I also authorize PrimeRates and its partners to share information about me and to I understand and agree that I am authorizing Marsden Building Society and its partners to send me special offers and promotions via email. send me email messages . Additionally, I agree to the Marsden Building Society Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Consent to Electronic Communications. Please agree to terms and conditions

questions.name: agreeTCPA
questions.consentText: I agree to allow Marsden Building Society to I authorize Marsden Building Society and its partner lenders, service providers, affiliates, and successors and assigns, to deliver telemarketing calls and text messages to each telephone number that I provide in connection with my inquiry and application for credit using an automatic telephone dialing system and/or a prerecorded or artificial voice message. I understand I am not required to provide this authorization as a condition of purchasing any property, goods or services. I certify that I have authority to provide this consent either because I am the subscriber of these telephone numbers or I am a non-subscriber customary user who has authority to consent to these communications. If I would like to revoke this consent, I agree to send an email to customerservice@themarsden.co.uk with 'Phone Call Opt-Out' in the subject line. call or text me at the phone numbers I have provided to discuss my application for credit and for other marketing purposes. (optional)

questions.name: login
questions.title: Login
questions.dynamicModalPopupContent:
Thank you!

Your account has been created.

We are sending an email to your inbox with a link to verify your account.

In order to access your account in future, you will need to click the link in that email to verify the account (you do not need to do it at this time).

questions.name: thankyoupage
questions.title: Thank You!
questions.description: Your application is approved, subject to final credit checks, valuation, and property criteria. A member of our team will be in contact with you within the next 24 hours to discuss next steps.

questions.name: greatChoice
questions.title: Great choice!
questions.description: You're on your way to receiving your funds. We just need a little more information.
